CustomField.description: User who onboarded the customer for SMS specifically. Set by the Customer Onboarding request Flow as the user who created the Customer Onboarding record from the SMS opp.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: User who onboarded the customer for SMS specifically. Set by the Customer Onboarding request Flow as the user who created the Customer Onboarding record from the SMS opp.
CustomField.label: SMS Onboarding Specialist
